backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing chat backend with room management, message posting, editing, and retrieval using Maps, Lists, and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking specific frontend files and components to rebuild and deployment requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx via module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling theme setup, routing between lobby and rooms, header/footer display, and URL hash sync for room IDs.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Dropdown theme switcher allowing users to select light, dark, or system mode.
frontend/src/features/chat/components/Me: Message input component supporting text, single-file upload or clipboard paste, progress tracking, and reply context.
Renders a chat message with editing, deletion, media handling, replies, and reaction UI. Manages blob URLs for media and triggers mutations for edits and deletes.
frontend/src/features/chat/reactions/Rea: Displays emoji reactions for a message and allows users to add or toggle reactions via a popover.
frontend/src/features/chat/RoomPage.tsx: Chat room page that validates rooms, loads messages, handles retries/errors, and renders message list with reply support.
frontend/src/features/lobby/EditNickname: Inline form for editing, saving, canceling, and clearing a user nickname with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/lobby/LobbyPage.ts: Lobby interface for setting nickname, creating rooms, and joining rooms with validation, mutations, and onboarding logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handlers, and persistence of identity across reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalProfile.ts: Stores and persists a local user ID and nickname in localStorage with helpers to update nickname.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for rooms, messages, and message actions using the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH-based CSS variables for light/dark themes, including chat bubble colors and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with OKLCH color variables, custom themes, animations, plugins, and extended utility settings.
project_state.json: Captures project metadata, current issues, architectural notes, and feature tracking for the anonymous chat application.
